events.title: AI Workshop for Tech Writers and Content Creators
events.tagline: Eight-week live cohort focused on practical AI workflows
events.summary: A live cohort for technical writers and content teams to build practical AI systems for drafting, editing, and governance.
events.description: This multi-session workshop combines strategy and hands-on implementation. Participants build repeatable workflows for research, drafting, editing, and quality checks while preserving voice, review standards, and governance expectations.
highlights: Structured prompting systems for high-quality first drafts
Editorial quality controls and policy-aligned review loops
Reusable workflow templates for documentation teams
events.imageAlt: AI Workshop for Tech Writers and Content Creators

events.title: Vibe Coding Webinar
events.tagline: Practical demos for modern vibe coding workflows
events.summary: A focused webinar on building and debugging vibe coding workflows that are practical for cross-functional teams.
events.description: Join this live session for a practical walk-through of vibe coding methods, demo patterns, and implementation mistakes to avoid. We will cover workflow setup, review checkpoints, and rollout guidance for real teams.
highlights: Practical workflow patterns you can apply immediately
